originalText.text: I’m waiting for my children to start. For the first time, I’m excited for my children to start somewhere. Im very picky with who can be around my children but Tashinia helped relax those nerves. She addressed all my concerns and went above and beyond as to help me open my expired voucher back up. Im very appreciative of her. I’ve observed the teachers with other children and even office staff interact with the children. It’s a loving and caring environment and I can’t wait for my children to be apart of that.

text.text: I’m waiting for my children to start. For the first time, I’m excited for my children to start somewhere. originalText.text: AMC Daycare is a great place they super friendly, respectful, kind and heart warming/welcoming. My 5 year old enjoyed her year there and always was excited to go to school and see Ms. Liz. My 3 year is a fan of her teachers Ms. Cindy and Ms. Paola she absolutely loves them with a passion and even at home she talks about them. Both of my daughters have demonstrated their growth and knowledge. Tanisha, enrollment specialist literally went above and beyond to enroll both of daughters into  AMC she even had back up planned if anything was to happen. Always contacted me when something was going on my case or what changes was updated. She’s very much dedicated to her position as well super loving and caring to my daughters and other little ones. I appreciate her so much. As well Nayibe amazing and loving to every single little one in the school. I definitely recommend AMC Daycare.

originalText.text: I am a new mom and loved the facility. Great beautiful big space. When I came for my tour I loved how the infant room is set up. Ms Tashinia is a great worker and she go over and beyond to get your child enrolled. My only problem was the direct Tony was very rude when I came there she made me feel very uncomfortable she need to know to talk to the parents without being nasty. Overall that’s my only issue.

text.text: I am a new mom and loved the facility. Great beautiful big space. When I came for my tour I loved how the infant room is set up. Ms Tashinia is a great worker and she go over and beyond to get your child enrolled. My only problem was the direct Tony was very rude when I came there she made me feel very uncomfortable she need to know to talk to the parents without being nasty. Overall that’s my only issue.

originalText.text: Tashinia is exceptional and super helpful. She has been useful in this journey with me as I find childcare for my kids. I highly recommend anyone looking to enroll their kid to speak directly to her.

text.text: Tashinia is exceptional and super helpful. She has been useful in this journey with me as I find childcare for my kids. I highly recommend anyone looking to enroll their kid to speak directly to her.

originalText.text: The Day Care is beautiful, spacious and the classrooms are organized with a lovely play space.  The teachers and staff are friendly especially the enrollment specialist Tashinia! If it wasn’t for her I would not have gotten through the enrollment process. She is patient, kind and cares about both the parent and child needs. She also does a very thorough walk through of the Day Care and enrollment process to keep you encouraged about attending. The parent/child counselor is also a saint!
